name: Pann The Game
blurb: A mysterious instrument brings Apollo deep into the hidden world of Pann. A 2D Rhythm Action Platformer for the Windows, Linux and Mac

rewards.reward: (= $15) The Journey Begins: DIGITAL COPY  ============================== DRM-free digital copy of Pann! Follow Apollo into an action packed adventure story based on rhythms! Pann is yours to play.

(= $25) The Prince: DIGITAL COPY + MANUAL + STRATEGY GUIDE ============================== DRM-free digital copy of Pann. A digital manual and digital strategy guide. Also a set of hi-res backers-exclusive wallpapers of Apollo - the main character.

(= $30) Hermes' Gift: DIGITAL COPY + MANUAL + STRATEGY GUIDE + WEAPON SKIN ============================== You will get a DRM-free digital copy of Pann, All the hi-res digital wallpapers, the digital manual and digital strategy guide. ALSO Apollo\u2019s legendary instrument (Lyre) weapon skin crafted by the god Hermes.

(= $40) Morning of Owl (EARLY BIRD): BETA ACCESS + WEAPON SKIN + APOLLO SKIN ============================== For this tier only: beta access! (No beta access for tiers stating 'includes all digital rewards') This tier includes all the previous rewards! You will get the complete digital art package (art book, avatars, wallpapers, concept art of characters and weapons), also the digital OST album of our amazing Sound Artist Mai. You will get the complete digital filming of the creation of Pann! In addition you will get BOTH the Crimson Mist Apollo skin and Vagabond Apollo Skin .

(= $40) Call of Rosa: OST + ART BOOK & PACK + FILMING + WEAPON SKIN ============================== This tier includes all the previous rewards! You will get the complete digital art package (art book, avatars, wallpapers, concept art of characters and weapons), also the digital OST album of our amazing Sound Artist Mai. You will get the complete digital filming of the creation of Pann! You can choose one of the two skins: The Crimson Mist Apollo skin or Vagabond Apollo Skin .

(= $95) Apollo's Lost Armor: T-SHIRT ==============================  This tier only:  Choose one of the two t-shirt designs created by Thomas our Artist! This tier includes all digital rewards. + An extra key for the game.

(= $300) A New God is Born: UNIQUE DRAWING BY THOMAS OUR ARTIST ============================== This tier is from the heart. An unique digital drawing by Thomas. + Two extra keys of the game for your friends. This tier includes all digital rewards.

(= $500) Call of the God's Power: CREATE YOUR OWN ATTACK COMBO ============================== Be a part of the team. Together we will create an unique attack combo! + Two extra keys of the game for your friends. Brag about your attack combo! This tier includes all digital rewards.

(= $690) I am a legend: YOUR NAME IN A BOSS CHARACTER ============================== Get your name in one of the bosses in Pann and be immortalized! + Two extra keys of the game for your friends. Brag about your name! This tier includes all digital rewards.

(= $690) The Child of Mj\u00f6lnir:   CREATE YOUR OWN WEAPON ============================== Be a part of the team. Together we will create a weapon for Apollo which will be processed in an attack combo!. + Two extra keys of the game for your friends. Show your friends the weapon! This tier includes all digital rewards.

(= $790) I am a Deity: CREATE YOUR OWN CHARACTER ============================== Be a part of the team. Together we will create a character that will be featured in the game. + Two extra keys of the game for your friends. Show your friends the character! This tier includes all digital rewards.

(= $790) Pann's Wrath: CREATE YOUR OWN ENEMY ==============================  Be a part of the team. Together we will create an enemy. + Two keys of the game for your friends. Show your friends the enemy! This tier includes all digital rewards.

(= $1400) Lost Blueprint of Pann: CREATE A LEVEL AND SOUNDTRACK ============================== Be a part of the team. Together we will create a level with a soundtrack and show you our work flow. + An extra key of the game for your friends. Be proud of your own level and music. This tier includes all digital rewards.

(= $9700) Call of Pann's Creators: MEET THE TEAM! GAME NIGHT ============================== Join our team on a game party, get to know our team members! You will get an exclusive signed physical boxed game and a signed filming of the development. A physical signed OST and The physical signed Artbook! We also have a surprise act for you! This tier includes all digital rewards.\r\n\r\nTraveling expenses are excluded
